title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-2.2 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-2.2 - Notification

State Regulations
(a) ORPTS shall
notify the subject property owner, of the receipt of an application for a State
advisory appraisal, and ask for the property owner's cooperation in completing
the appraisal. (b) ORPTS shall
provide a draft report of the advisory appraisal to the assessor and the
property owner. The property owner and the assessor shall have 14 days from the
date the draft report was sent to comment to ORPTS. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8195-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
